nnon into the hole.=A0 The blast was long a fair powerful, widening the tun=
nel entrance slightly as the eart ad rockwas heated and melted.=A0 When the=
 blast subsided, Megatron stood up straight to observe his handy work.

<DIV>Kup<BR><BR>"Its our brest choice"said the old autobots<BR><BR>--- In <A href="mailto:nbwrpg%40yahoogroups.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com</A>, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...> <BR>wrote:<BR>><BR>> > "PERCEPTOR!! !"shouted the old aoutobot"He' s s the only <BR>> > that i know that he can dig a tunnel or walk under ground"<BR>> <BR>> Legacy nodded as Kup spoke, "A POSSIBILITY, THE SIGNATURE IS <BR>CLEARLY PREDACON."<BR>> <BR>> > Megatron X strode to the hole and sneered down into it.  Why <BR>> > did Cybertronians stoop to adopting such organic forms?  It was <BR>> > degrading.  He brought his fusion cannon online and aimed down<BR>> > the hole.  A strong enough long duration blast could make the <BR>> > tunnel stable and large enough an army could follow.<BR>> > <BR>> > "Well then, we'll just flush them out.  I will
 not dignify these <BR>cowards<BR>> > by going under the ground to get them!"<BR>> <BR>> Legacy stepped over to the hole as he aimed his rather formidable <BR>looking cannon at the opening. However rather than firing a blast <BR>into it he simply scanned it. "AND HOW DO YOU PROPOSE TO FLUSH THEM? <BR>READINGS INDICATE THAT THIS TUNNEL CONTINUES FOR THAN ONE <BR>THOUSAND METERS* ."  <BR>> <BR>> Legacy looked at Megatron, "LOGICALLY, SINCE THEY HAVE ALREADY <BR>DISPLAYED A FACILITY FOR TUNNELING, THEY WOULD JUST CONTINUE IN THE <BR>DIRECTION THEY WERE ALREADY TRAVELLING."   <BR>> <BR>> (TAG: Megatron, Kup, Gimlock)<BR>> <BR>> ((*OOC: I am not sure what the Cybertronian term for meters is, but <BR>please assume that he used that term.))<BR>> <BR>> Preston<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
